court: -1- *** IN THE HIGH COURT OF PUNJAB AND HARYANA AT CHANDIGARH Date of decision: 13.5.2013 Nand Kishore Chawla .Petitioner Vs. State of Haryana and others .Respondents CORAM: HON BLE MR.JUSTICE GURMEET SINGH SANDHAWALIA ***** Present: None for the petitioner Mr. K.C.Bhatia, Addl. Advocate General, Haryana for the respondents. ***** G.S.SANDHAWALIA, J. (Oral) . Challenge in the present writ petition is to the order dated .4.1994 (Annexure P-3) wherein the petitioner was ordered to be treated as Clerk in view of the interim order passed by the Hon'ble Apex Court which had stayed the operation of order dated 24.9.1993 in Civil Writ Petition No.942 of 1993 Nand Kishore Chawla Vs. Haryana State and others. Challenge is also made to the order dated 16.5.1994 (Annexure P-4) whereby the petitioner had been transferred from Municipal Committee, Narnaund to Municipal Committee, Jakhal. . A perusal of the record of Civil Writ Petition No.942 of 1993 shows that order dated 24.9.1993 was set aside by the Hon'ble Apex Court and the case was remitted to this Court to reconsider the matter, which was pertaining to the grant of full pay scale of office -2- *** Superintendent to the petitioner on the basis of equal pay for equal work. The said writ petition was thereafter dismissed as withdrawn on .12.2009. . In the present writ petition, no interim order was passed regarding the transfer of the petitioner and the said transfer was ordered on 16.5.1994 and about 19 years have passed since then. The writ petition has been rendered infructuous by sheer efflux of time. . Accordingly, the writ petition is disposed of as having been rendered infructuous. .5.2013 (G.S.SANDHAWALIA) Pka JUDGE -3- ***
